property.value: INSTANT POWER: Use when entering combat. Look at the top 5 cards of your opponent's Life Deck and put them back in any order. POWER: Energy attack. You may shuffle any number of cards from your hand into your Life Deck to draw the same number of cards. DAMAGE: 5 life cards.

property.name: Type
property.value: Hero MP

property.name: Text
property.value: CONSTANT POWER: When you perform an attack that uses AT, raise your anger 1 level. POWER: Physical attack. DAMAGE: AT Stages. HIT: Gain 5 stages or destroy the top card of your opponent's Life Deck.

property.name: Type
property.value: Hero MP

property.name: Text
property.value: CONSTANT POWER: Your AT is considered to be 3 for your attacks. POWER: You may discard a card from your hand to draw a card. Lower your opponent's anger 2 levels or your efefcts that destroy cards from the top of your opponent's Life Deck have that amount increased by 1 this combat.

property.name: Type
property.value: Hero MP

property.name: Text
property.value: CONSTANT POWER: Your AT is ocnsidered to be 4 for your attacks. POWER: Physical attack. Place a Setup or Drill in play on top of their owner's Life Deck or use a critical damage ffect and this attack is considered to deal critical damage. DAMAGE: AT stages.

property.name: Type
property.value: Hero MP

property.name: Text
property.value: CONSTANT POWER: When you perform an attack, your AT is considered to be 5 for that attack or it gains HIT: Destroy the top 2 cards of your opponent's Life Deck. POWER: Physical lattack. Gain 10 stages or Rejuvenate 3. DAMAGE: AT +5 stages.

property.name: Type
property.value: Villain MP

property.name: Text
property.value: CONSTANT POWER: Your attacks with Sword in the title gain HIT: Raise your anger 1 level. INSTANT POWER: Use when entering combat. Search the top 5 cards of your Life Deck for a Named card or card with Sword in the title and place it into your hand. If that card is a Setup or Drill, you may place it into play instead. Shuffle the remaining cards into your Life Deck.

property.name: Type
property.value: Villain MP

property.name: Text
property.value: CONSTANT POWER: Your attacks with Sword in the title deal +1 stage and +1 life card of damage. POWER: Physical attack. Raise your anger 1 level. DAMAGE: 5 stages. HIT: Search your discard pile for a Styled or Named card with Sword in the title and place it into your hand.

property.name: Type
property.value: Villain MP

property.name: Text
property.value: CONSTANT POWER: Your attacks with Sword in the title cannot have their damage prevented. POWER: Physical attack. Choose a card in your discard pile and Rejuvenate it. Choose 3 cards in your opponent's discard pile and banish them. You may discard a card with Sword in the title from your hand. If you do, you may use this attack a second time this combat. DAMAGE: 7 stages.

property.name: Type
property.value: Villain MP

property.name: Text
property.value: CONSTANT POWER: Your attacks with Sword in the title deal +1 stage and +1 life card of damage and gain All of your opponent's personalities lose 2 stages. POWER: Search your Life Deck or discard pile for a card with Sword in the title and place it into your hand.

property.name: Type
property.value: Hero MP

property.name: Text
property.value: (Your Life deck cannot include cards that perform energy attacks.) CONSTANT POWER: Your non-Styled attacks cannot have their damage modified by your effects. POWER: Physical attack. Search your Life Deck for Hercule's Championship Belt and play it. DAMAGE: 4 stages. HIT: Raise your anger 2 levels.

property.name: Type
property.value: Hero MP

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Energy attack. Lower your opponent's anger 1 level. DAMAGE: 2 life cards. HIT: Stops the next energy attack performed against you this combat.

property.value: CONSTANT POWER: Your Ginyu Force Allies may make actions regardless of your MP's power stage and they cannot be discarded. Your attacks deal +2 life cards of damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: CONSTANT POWER: Your Allies may make actions regardless of your MP's power stage and they cannot be discarded. Your attacks deal +X life cards of damage. X=The number of Allies you have in play when you perform that attack.
